menu.name: Caesar Salad
menu.description: Crisp romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese.

menu.name: Bruschetta
menu.description: Grilled bread topped with diced tomatoes, garlic, basil, and olive oil.

menu.name: Grilled Salmon
menu.description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled to perfection with lemon butter sauce.

menu.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
menu.description: Classic Italian pasta dish with creamy egg-based sauce, pancetta, and parmesan cheese.

menu.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
menu.description: Rich chocolate cake with a gooey molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.
